Uses of Package
hjz_zork

  • Classes in hjz_zork used by hjz_zork 
    Class and Description
    Character
    Class of objects that represent characters that can move around the dungeon and also pick up and drop items and perform actions with/on items Characters can gain score, lose health, add health and die
    Command
    Abstract class representing a user command to the Bork interpreter.
    Dungeon
    Class representing the Bork dungeon.
    Exit
    Class representing an exit for a room in the Bork dungeon.
    Exit.NoExitException
    Exception class representing when there are no exits to read from a dungeon (.bork) file.
    GameState
    An enum singleton representing the game's state.
    Item
    Simulate items found in the dungeon, items can have specific commands associated with them that can have text responses associated with them as well as events that will take place if those commands are performed
    Item.NoItemException
    no items left
    Room
    Class of objects that represent rooms with exits that can be walked through and also items that can be picked up.
    Room.LockedRoomException
    Exception thrown when attempting to pass through a locked exit
    Room.NoRoomException
    Exception thrown when attempting to read a room object when there is none there to read
    Troll.NoTrollException
    The NoTrollException class extends Exception
